title: [1.12.2-1.7.10][SAO UI mod——刀剑神域用户界面][永久更新][授权搬运]
author: yuudachi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 yuudachi 于 2020-12-2 18:28 编辑 

关于网盘分流和Bug反馈的统一回答1.该MOD并非使用能够自由分发的相关授权，作者仅允许本人以指路的方式分享该MOD，所以本人不会使用网盘对该MOD进行分流。
2.介于本人没有空闲时间传达玩家的bug反馈，请玩家遇到bug时自行联系作者。
MOD简介来自Argus Development团队的作品（准确的说是接坑），颠覆Minecraft的用户界面，让玩家能够在Minecraft里面拥有骚（SAO）的体验（包括没有退出按钮… (っ °Д °;)っ）
玩家状态栏、玩家血条、生物血条、生物是否对立，等等，这些SAO里面的画面在Minecraft里都实现了
更多可玩性有待玩家自己去挖掘！
该MOD目前也处于早期阶段，相信以后会加入更多的骚（SAO）元素。

PS:下面的内容除了MOD下载的信息以外其他的内容因为过于久远可能部分已经不适合于最新的MOD版本
PS2:因为论坛用户@LinLei_Baruch已经将简中语言文件提交给作者，作者说明后期会加入到MOD中，但个人估计仅限目前还更新的1.12.2客户端版本（2.1.4版没有加入）
使用注意呼出SAO菜单——EscSAO菜单全程使用鼠标操作使用SAO UI MOD后，部分原版游戏按键功能会被屏蔽（例如E键打开背包）打开Minecraft游戏菜单——Esc呼出SAO菜单→点击最底下图标→点击Help打开Minecraft设定界面——Esc呼出SAO菜单→点击最底下图标→点击Option→点击Options..关闭游戏——打开Minecraft游戏菜单 or 设定界面后右上角退出游戏——1.打开Minecraft游戏菜单选择“保存并退回到游戏画面” | 2.Esc呼出SAO菜单→点击最底下图标→点击Option→点击Can Log Out→重新呼出SAO菜单→点击最底下图标→点击Logout打开背包——Esc呼出SAO菜单→点击最顶上图标→点击Skills→点击Crafting

MOD截图




关于saomclib部分客户端版本可能需要这个前置MOD，既然你们都能在提问中说出名称了为什么不直接去问那什么度、什么应、什么歌、什么虎么←_←

链接地址：请点击此
关于saomclib的前置MOD根据某坛友的说法saomclib也是需要安装前置MOD的(Forgelin+librarianlib)，如果你没有看到这段话请在看到这段后直接去问那什么度、什么应、什么歌、什么虎的。如果已经看到或早就知道的请自觉主动去什么度、什么应、什么歌、什么虎。

希望不要再套娃了。。。

链接地址：
Shadowfacts' Forgelin
LibrarianLib
最新下载地址（官方）客户端版本MOD版本
(正式版[R]/测试版[A/B])下载地址备注1.12.2(R)2.1.4download1.10/1.9.4(B)1.6.0download停止更新1.9(R)1.6.0-Dev1download停止更新1.8.9(R)1.6.0-Dev1download停止更新1.8(R)1.6.0-Dev1download停止更新1.7.10(R)1.6.0-Dev1download停止更新
更新历史1.0:（相对于原弃坑作者最终版）
Fixed some bugs I found
Support for another UI layout (currently with HD textures thanks to Justice~)
Cleaned up some parts
Lots of options added to the ui
More things I forgot...
1.1:
Fixed bug with players list (default TAB)
Added almost all the potionEffects (No icons for harm/instant_damage, confusion/nausea, digSlowDown/mining_fatigue (inCodeName/unlocalized_name))
The SAO theme is now HD
Options are now sorted in categories
Some other random bugfixes
1.2:
Fix effects icons
Fix compatibility with other mods adding things to the UI
Other compatibility fixes
Few performance improvements
1.7.10 backport is out!
1.3:
Fixed UI modules being overridden by mods and minecraft, causing weird graphical glitches.
Improved the color tracking for entities to provide much greater coverage and performance improvements.
Fixed the death gui crash when attempting to click the button.
Added prevention methods for UI elements from the mod being overridden by other mods.
Added Default and Vanilla style hotbar options
Fix a ConcurrentModificationException bug with the sound
Greatly improved texture quality of the UI
1.4
An enormous amount of flipped tables, to Blaez's despair...
Tons of optimizations, code cleanups, little fixes, qol improvements, ...
Fixed the bug making some infos appear in the wrong tab (IG menu)
Fixed players not rendering the HP bar and crystal
New option: menus can now pause the game
New option: use a custom SAO-themed font
(last but not least...) Feature comeback: Socials! (friends and PT, no custom PMs yet, sowwyy ;_; ) -> these are still a bit experimental, as our small team couldn't test them to the fullest. Torture them, break them, and post issues herehttp://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/sao-ui/issues
1.5
Completely rewrote the render code, providing performance increases and better compatibility
Added Boss health bar
Added Mount view and stats to character screen when riding a mount
Fixed a potential memory leak
Redone the menu listings
Added basic bauble support
New death particles
Item icons now appear on the SAO Inventory
Enchant effects are displayed on the slot for any item enchanted
Rewrote color states to be more dynamic as well as add methods for future api
Cleaned up events
Party invites fixed
New Aggro System
Infinate Scrolling of items in SAO Menu
Empty item subcategories wont appear anymore, making it easier to find stuff
UI now displayed air and mount jump (Only vanilla textures, but should be enough until the new UI is done)
Improved the SAO Font option
1.6
未更新以下为Curseforge更新日志1.12.2-2.1.1
Fixed a crash issue with the menu.
1.12.2-2.1.0
Show empty when crafting window has no recipes.
Split rendering into background, main, and foreground.
Major optimization to static render.
Item filter fixes and proper slot equipment.
Correctly name Entities option.
Change default value for Enemy Onscreen Health to true.
Properly change hotbar when vanilla theme is selected.
Add currently targeted enemy to the top of the enemy list.
Remove trade option and crafting option from item check.
Delete old ContainerElements.kt.
Add shading to health and crystal render.
1.12.2-2.0.3
Completely rebuilt from the ground up, featuring a theme system as well as a new menu system. Sadly this is only a beta and as such, bugs and missing features are to be expected. When reporting any issues, please do so on our discord channel.
1.12.2-2.0.4
无
1.12.2-2.0.5
Updated dependency info
1.12.2-2.0.6
Redone sound engine
Fixed item filters
Add options for Mob health bars
Added sounds back to menu
1.12.2-2.0.7
Move health steps to entity capability
Add options for all crystals
Remove useless and unused options
Fix optionDefaultDebug text
Unlisten to renderPlayerListener (Might not be needed)
Fix GLState error
1.12.2-2.0.8
Added distance for mob health
Fixed a memory leak
1.12.2-2.0.9
Correct required mods.
Remove old neo, as this is now fully replaced normal.
Allow Elements.kt valid setting be mutable.
Change party menu and inventory to be updated when changed (not 100% complete)
Make option changes trigger OptionTriggerEvent.kt
Change item category icons to item icons
Remove render cache (needs to be redone)
Bumped version
1.12.2-2.1.0
Show empty when crafting window has no recipes.
Split rendering into background, main, and foreground.
Major optimization to static render.
Item filter fixes and proper slot equipment.
Correctly name Entities option.
Change default value for Enemy Onscreen Health to true.
Properly change hotbar when vanilla theme is selected.
Add currently targeted enemy to the top of the enemy list.
Remove trade option and crafting option from item check.
Delete old ContainerElements.kt.
Add shading to health and crystal render.
1.12.2-2.1.1
Fixed a crash issue with the menu.
1.12.2-2.1.2
Smooth healthbar fixed.
Food and air bars added to default theme.
Unused buttons disabled.
Performance fixes
1.12.2-2.1.3
Fixed some crash issues with the latest build.
1.12.2-2.1.4
Experimental ingame gui handler for handling conflicts.
Improved death screen effects.
Fixed elements moving too far when closed.

帖子更新历史2020.11.28 - 更新2.1.4版
2020.04.21 - 更新2.1.1版
2020.02.14 - 更新2.0.9版，增加1.12.2版客户端支持
2019.05.28 - 修复1.6版各游戏版本下载链接
2016.07.24 - 更新1.6版，增加1.9.4、1.10版客户端支持
2016.03.27 - 1.9版客户端更新1.5.5版
2016.03.25 - 更新1.5a版，增加1.9版客户端支持
2016.03.07 - 更新1.5版（除非特殊情况，否则之后默认不包含1.8.8版客户端）
2016.02.01 - 1.8.0版客户端更新1.4.1版
2016.01.23 - 发布1.4/1.4.a版本汉化文件
2016.01.22 - 1.8.9版客户端更新1.4.a版
2016.01.16 - 1.8.0版客户端更新1.4版；1.7.10版客户端更新1.4.a版客户端；增加1.8.9版客户端支持
2015.12.27 - 更新1.3版；增加1.8.8版客户端支持；
2015.09.27 - 更新1.2版；增加1.7.10版客户端支持
2015.08.14 - 更新1.1版
2015.07.26 - 发布个人汉化文件
2015.07.23 - 首次发布

关于汉化本人因工作问题无限期暂停汉化工作，如有人想汉化的可将汉化文件附在回复中并PM我，我将把楼层附在本段文字下面（2016年8月11日开始）
322# - 1.12.2 2.1.1版汉化（该用户可能会再在此楼更换后续MOD版本的中文语言文件，顾请自行去查看）
153# - 1.9.4-1.10.2 1.6版汉化
173# - 1.7.10 未知版本汉化
181# - 1.7.10 1.6版汉化
200# - 1.7.10 1.6版汉化

备注下载列表仅提供最新版本的，需要旧版本的请自行到官网上下载1.8.8客户端版请使用Forge 1.8.8-11.15.0.1640以上版本1.8客户端版请使用Forge 1.8-11.14.1.1419以上版本1.8客户端版请务必使用Java 8个人测试的bug并非为全部，如果还有其他的bug可以去官方提交汉化文件使用方法：用压缩软件打开MOD.jar→将解压得到的zh_CN.lang文件放入jar中的assets\saoui\lang文件夹下即可因工作原因，个人汉化工作无期限暂停，该帖仅作搬运

搬运授权截图再次感谢Argus Development Team的接坑，其成员为：
Justice~ (Licoifi on the forums)
Felphor (Felphor on the forums)
LordCruaver (CruaverVoidDrake on the forums)
Bluexin

Q: I get a random crash/bug!
A: First, read the known bugs to see if it isn't listed. Then update Forge (the mod is currently built with Forge 1.8-11.14.1.1419 and make sure you use Java 8. If it still happens, please upload a log to pastebin if there is one (ie crash) or the details of the bug, how to reproduce it (and a pic would be perfect if it can be seen). Thanks!复制代码

replies.author: qq837958025
replies.txt_content: 这个UI的血条显示 跟NPC中的自定义NPC会显示不出来血条或者原版生物看不到贴图隐身一样

replies.author: wo_bin
replies.txt_content: 可以选择1.8版本的sao血条。1.8的血条不会对npc隐身。缺点是npc没有血条原版的npc也没有。[生物有血条]
